name: Kings Keep
description:
Kings Keep is a relaxing game where the objective is to retrieve treasure from the castle. The Treasure is hidden behind a door and to unlock this door you have to find keys located around the castle. To get the keys you must make it past various obstacles and solve puzzles.

This game was originally made for our university course where we were tasked with designing a level for a game. To do this we purchased most of the assets used in the game. This allowed us to focus more on the level design and layout.

Controls

MouseLookW,A,S,DMoveEInteract

Developers
Scott Ewing
Chloe Forrester
Ross Derrick

Assets Purchased
Mana Station - Multistory Dungeons
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/multistory-dungeo...

Catalin Pavel  - Low Poly Medieval Kit
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-medieval-kit-1555...
